interface.name: properties.Motile
interface.description: Define all elements of the simulation able to move by itself. Motile elements are other agents, crowds and companies...

method.name: canBeFollowed
method.description: Returns "true" if this element can be followed by the agent, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: isMoving
method.description: Returns 'true' if this element is moving, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: getName
method.description: Returns the name of the motile element.
